name: Terrorarium
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/EventHeader_Template_small.jpg?t=1718983732[/img][h2]Terrorarium is now also available for the Tilt Five Holographic Gaming System![/h2]We're so excited to be working on this new version of the game with the incredible AR glasses designed by Tilt Five. Honestly we could hardly believe it the first time we saw the game through the glasses - it jumps straight out of the tabletop and you can look at every level from any angle.  Just download the game with your Tilt Five glasses connected and it will appear before your eyes.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/description_img3.png?t=1718983732[/img]
We took all your feedback over the past year and redesigned SO much of the game - we call it our BLOOD OCEAN update and itâ€™s finally the way we always wanted to play.
 
[b]Hereâ€™s our top 10 list of updates:[/b]
1. Respawn at Checkpoints! No more frustrations mid-level! We even place a little ghost granny in every spot youâ€™ve died before so you can remember those difficult moments.
2. A proper campaign with over 50 levels across multiple planets
3. PERSISTENT GORE - itâ€™s everywhere now and accumulates each replay
4. Gooey Moogu do so much more now! Stick monsters in place and build fuses
5. Maker Mode works so much better now with height adjustments to make more complex levels. Assigning paths to creatures is much smoother too.
6. Fixed so many mechanics - Beckon plants arenâ€™t annoying now and monsters have clearer hitboxes. Thereâ€™s even a poison cloud and tornado now!
7. Every level starts with a flyby animation that lets you see what youâ€™re about to conquer.
8. 100+ new assets in Maker Mode - we found them between the couch cushions and figured why not?
9. New and improved animated cutscenes - honestly weâ€™re just better at 3D now.
10. You actually have to confirm before we delete your Maker level. This was a stupid one thatâ€™s totally on us. RIP all those accidentally deleted levels.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/Terrorarium_-_Official_Release_Trailer.gif?t=1718983732[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/Features.png?t=1718983732[/img]
[b]Explore surreal alien worlds, protect your beloved Moogu spawn, and hurl them at enemies to their murderous - and hilarious - deaths.[/b]
 
ğŸ„ Survive a gauntlet of  50+ level campaign
ğŸ„ Shepherd expendable Moogu and hurl them at enemies to solve puzzles
ğŸ„ Craft your own levels in Maker Mode with over 200 3D obstacles
ğŸ„ Share your creations in-game via Steam Workshop
ğŸ„ Play and rate community-made murder gardens

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/Terrorarium_Gameplay_GIF_Shroomovator__1_.gif?t=1718983732[/img]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/About_Terrorarium.png?t=1718983732[/img]
Terrorarium is an action-packed puzzle platformer about setting out to win the annual murder garden competition hosted by the Intergalactic Horrorcultural Society. Play as The Gardener, the beloved and perpetual-runner-up space granny, as she flaunts the rules with her genetically-engineered ambulatory mushrooms aka Moogu in tow.
 
Then, head on over to Maker Mode to create, build, and play community-made murder gardens supported by Steam Workshop.
 
Do what you must to win the blue ribbon and onward to victory!!


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1003450/extras/Terrorarium_Gameplay_GIF_Sticking_Enemies.gif?t=1718983732[/img]

* Terrorarium is made with the generous support of the Canada Media Fund, Ontario Creates and the Games Institute.
